reviewText:
Loved it and I practically grew up with all these lovely ladies. The video is visually stunning, but of course they are all beautiful to look at. I have had a hard time finding this in a DVD format, but, at least I have this among my others to watch. Thank you HBO video.
If you were in your twenties in the 80s or at least 23 at the time of this video, you'll enjoy these ladies very much and remember them even more. Lots of boobs here and pretty faces. A good one to have in your Playboy video vault!
The bunnies are featured at random, not the month they actually appeared in the video, but they are all here nonetheless.
* The PLAYMATES shown are ~
** INDIA ALLEN (Playmate of the Year 1988)
** DIANA LEE
** TERRI LYNN DOSS (Had a small cameo in 1989's "Roadhouse" at the bar.)
** SHARRY KONOPSKI (Now deceased as of mid 2017, Cancer)
** LYNNE AUSTIN
** REBECCA FERRATI
** CARMEN BERG
** SUSIE OWENS
** PAMELA STEIN
** KIMBERLY CONRAD (Playmate of the Year 1989)
** BRANDI BRANDT (October 1987)
** ELOISE BRODY

Definitely going with "it's ok" on this one.  The other review from 2001 is pretty spot on as far as what parts are good, tame, weird, etc.  I definitely felt there was too much editing going on here - I've recently seen the 1987 video calendar which was really good (including a very memorable scene of I think Barbara Edwards doing some nude dancing with a laser light and it was HOT and the low camera angle lets you see everything) so compared to that, this isn't as lingering or intimate and the ladies often keep their knees together, so to speak.  It's more artistic than erotic... and that doesn't always work.  It gives me the impression that the girls don't really *want* me to see them fully nude or reveal their passions.

Also, even though my VHS copy is essentially brand new, it still doesn't look too good.  Wow, I can't believe we all used to watch this quality all the time...  But I have lots of stuff that was converted from VHS to DVD that looks far better than this.  Darker scenes in particular tend to get pretty mangled into a mess of big square pixels.

If you're a collector and especially if you saw this when it came out and had the chance to form an early bond with it, then naturally this would be nice to have and enjoy watching.  But for me, seeing it for the first time and already having the 1987 video calendar in mind, this will probably end up tucked away in one of my storage bins.

I mostly like breasts so the other review saying Brandi Brandt is only nude 10% of the time seems downplayed to me.  She is topless most of the time.

I liked over 1/2 the Playmate for this year better than average.  Can't say there was an absolute dud like many years either.

20 years later, I still enjoyed it.

Playboy 1989 Video Playmate Calendar is 53 minutes long. The Playmates are in order of the calendar, not when they were an actually Playmate a good example is India Allen. She was Playmate of the month for December 1987; she is shown as Miss January. All Playmates are sexy and beautiful to look at, but not all nudity is created equal. Some show it all and some Playmates show their nudity briefly. Listed below are the Playmates shown in order of the month.

India Allen\Miss January-Nudity is there, but you have to wait for it and are sometimes hidden
Diana Lee\Miss February-80% of the time not nude
Terry Lynn Doss\Miss March-Either Topless or nude
Sharry Konopski\Miss April-Nude during the later half of her segment
Lynne Austin\Miss May-Nude 70% of the time
Rebecca Ferratti\Miss June-Nude 25% of the time
Carmen Berg\Miss July-Half of the time nude
Susie Owens\Miss August-Nudity is brief, mainly topless; first part of video is funny
Pamela Stein\Miss September-Nude Sometimes
Kimberly Conrad\Miss October-Nude in the beginning
Brandi Brandt\Miss November-about 10% of the time she is fully nude
Eloise Broady\Miss December-Nudity is brief

Overall the video is okay. You either liked or hated it. Playboy 1989 Video Playmate Calendar gets a C.
